instruction: fun sci-fi movie with aliens and time travel
output: You gotta check out Men in Black 3! 🕶️👽 It's got aliens, time travel, and plenty of laughs with Will Smith and Tommy Lee Jones. Perfect mix of action and comedy that'll keep you hooked!

instruction: a cool action comedy with buddy cops and aliens
output: If you want a wild ride with buddy cops and aliens, Men in Black 3 is the way to go! 🚀😂 Will Smith and Tommy Lee Jones bring the perfect combo of humor and action. Plus, time travel twists make it extra fun!

instruction: movie where characters go back in time to save the future
output: For a slick time-travel adventure, watch Men in Black 3! ⏳👾 Agent J goes back in time to save his partner and the world. It’s action-packed and funny — a total blast!
